scripts.initial: composer install & npm i && npm run certificates && (npm run dev:php:build & npm run dev:spa)
scripts.dev: npm run dev:php & npm run dev:spa
scripts.dev:php: composer dump-autoload && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.dev:php:build: composer dump-autoload && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js
scripts.format: npm run format:php && npm run format:js
